slides.title: Physics - Basic Concepts
slides.content:
**Units of Measurement:**
- Length: Meter (m)
- Mass: Kilogram (kg)
- Time: Second (s)
- Temperature: Kelvin (K)

**Force = Mass × Acceleration**
**Pressure = Force / Area**
**Work = Force × Distance**
**Power = Work / Time**

slides.title: Newton's Laws of Motion
slides.content:
**First Law (Inertia):**
Body remains at rest or in uniform motion unless acted upon by external force

**Second Law:**
F = ma (Force = mass × acceleration)

**Third Law:**
For every action, there is an equal and opposite reaction

slides.title: Chemistry - Periodic Table
slides.content:
**Elements arranged by atomic number**

**Periods:** 7 horizontal rows
**Groups:** 18 vertical columns

**Key Elements:**
- Hydrogen (H) - Atomic No. 1
- Carbon (C) - Atomic No. 6
- Oxygen (O) - Atomic No. 8
- Gold (Au) - Atomic No. 79

**Nobel Gases:** He, Ne, Ar, Kr, Xe, Rn

slides.title: Biology - Human Body
slides.content:
**Major Systems:**

**Circulatory:** Heart, blood vessels
**Respiratory:** Lungs, trachea
**Digestive:** Stomach, intestines
**Nervous:** Brain, spinal cord
**Skeletal:** 206 bones in adult
**Muscular:** 600+ muscles

**Largest organ:** Skin
**Smallest bone:** Stapes (ear)

slides.title: Vitamins and Deficiencies
slides.content:
**Vitamin A:** Vision, deficiency causes night blindness

**Vitamin B1 (Thiamine):** Deficiency causes Beriberi

**Vitamin C:** Deficiency causes Scurvy

**Vitamin D:** Bone health, deficiency causes Rickets

**Vitamin K:** Blood clotting

slides.title: Diseases and Causative Agents
slides.content:
**Bacterial:**
- Tuberculosis (TB)
- Cholera
- Typhoid

**Viral:**
- COVID-19
- Dengue
- Influenza

**Protozoan:**
- Malaria (Plasmodium)
- Amoebic dysentery
